gameDetail.LuckyHashIntroduction1: Big or Smaill is a simple and thrilling number guessing game where players predict whether the last digit of a blockchain transaction hash is large or small. Correct guesses earn rewards.
gameDetail.LuckyHashRules11: Result Determination: The game outcome is determined by the last digit of your transfer transaction's hash value.
gameDetail.SteptoPlay11: Connect Wallet: Click the "Connect Wallet" button to link your cryptocurrency wallet.
gameDetail.SteptoPlay12: Enter Bet Amount: Enter your bet amount directly in the input box
gameDetail.SteptoPlay13: Confirm Bet: After entering the amount or completing the transfer, click the "Bet" button to confirm your bet.
gameDetail.SteptoPlay14: Wait for Result: Once the transaction is confirmed, the system will automatically determine win/loss based on the hash value.
gameDetail.LuckyHashIntroduction2: Hash Odd Even is a classic odd-even number prediction game. Similar to Hash Size, but here you predict whether the last digit of the hash value is odd or even.
gameDetail.LuckyHashRules21: Result Determination: The game outcome is determined by the last digit of your transfer transaction's hash value.
gameDetail.LuckyHashIntroduction3: Lucky Hash is a more challenging lucky hash game. Instead of focusing solely on the last digit, it involves the combination of the last two characters of the hash value, offering even greater excitement.
gameDetail.LuckyHashRules31: Result Determination: The game outcome is determined by the last two characters of your transfer transaction's hash value.
gameDetail.LuckyHashIntroduction4: Hash Number is the highest-odds and most challenging game on our platform. You must accurately predict the exact last digit of the hash value — a correct guess awards a reward of up to 9.98x!
gameDetail.LuckyHashRules41: Result Determination: The game outcome is determined by the last digit of your transfer transaction's hash value.
gameDetail.LuckyHashRules42.1: Winning Condition: The number you bet must exactly match the last digit of the hash value.
